name: The House With No Windows
description:
It is Halloween night.  The warmth of the house with no windows feels like hiding under a blanket on a cold winter day.  Be wary though, because intruders are on their way.

This game was made for #SCREAMJAM

Duration: About 5 minutes.

Ratings are greatly appreciated .

Credits:

3D models and textures:
Epic Games
Zhenya Chistovsky - Classic Room
